verbose_text: We reasoned that if S1pr1 functions in vivo as an itch receptor, then a sensory-neuron-specific knockout (KO) of this GPCR should produce mice lacking itch responses to S1p (CYM5442).
evidence: S1pr1 functions in vivo as an itch receptor, then a sensory-neuron-specific knockout (KO) of this GPCR should produce mice lacking itch
